LanguageData.RT_PLZ83_Vehicle.label: PLZ83
LanguageData.RT_PLZ83_Vehicle.description:
A SPG equipped with an 155mm howitzer and .50BMG machine gun, needed deployed to fire, has poor armor but deadly firepower.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x3，Commander x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
155mm（Main Cannon）
.50BMG（Support MG）
